title: LimX Dynamics picks up $200M for humanoid robot expansion
description:
LimX Dynamics plans to continue developing humanoid and semi-humanoid robots for Chinese and global markets.

The post LimX Dynamics picks up $200M for humanoid robot expansion appeared first on The Robot Report.
